Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically for individuals like yourself. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
